deprecated_features.title: Array and string offset access using curly braces deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Using curly braces for array and string offset access is deprecated. Use square brackets instead

deprecated_features.title: Real type deprecated
deprecated_features.description: The (real) cast and is_real() function are deprecated

deprecated_features.title: Unbinding $this from non-static closures deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Unbinding $this from non-static closures that use $this is deprecated
deprecated_features.recommendation: Make the closure static or keep $this binding

deprecated_features.title: parent keyword without parent class deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Using parent:: without a parent class is deprecated
deprecated_features.recommendation: Ensure class has a parent before using parent::

deprecated_features.title: Implode with parameters in wrong order deprecated
deprecated_features.description: Calling implode() with parameters in the wrong order is deprecated

behavior_changes.title: Numeric string behavior change
behavior_changes.description: Numeric strings are now handled more consistently

new_features.title: Typed properties
new_features.description: Class properties now support type declarations

new_features.title: Arrow functions
new_features.description: Short closures using fn() syntax are now available

new_features.title: Spread operator in array expressions
new_features.description: The spread operator ... can now be used in array expressions
